db:abstract.db:para: The QCameraFocusControl class supplies control for focusing related camera parameters.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The interface name of QCameraFocusControl is org.qt-project.qt.camerafocuscontrol/5.0 as defined in QCameraFocusControl_iid.

db:section.db:title: [explicit protected] QCameraFocusControl::QCameraFocusControl(QObject *parent = Q_NULLPTR)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a camera control object with parent.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QCameraFocusControl::~QCameraFocusControl()
db:section.db:para: Destruct the camera control object.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QPointF QCameraFocusControl::customFocusPoint() const
db:section.db:para: Return the position of custom focus point, in relative frame coordinates: QPointF(0,0) points to the left top frame point, QPointF(0.5,0.5) points to the frame center.
Custom focus point is used only in FocusPointCustom focus mode.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraFocusControl::customFocusPointChanged(const QPointF &point)
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when the custom focus point is changed.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QCameraFocus::FocusModes QCameraFocusControl::focusMode() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the focus mode being used.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraFocusControl::focusModeChanged(QCameraFocus::FocusModes mode)
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when the focus mode is changed, usually in result of QCameraFocusControl::setFocusMode call or capture mode changes.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QCameraFocus::FocusPointMode QCameraFocusControl::focusPointMode() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the camera focus point selection mode.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraFocusControl::focusPointModeChanged(QCameraFocus::FocusPointMode mode)
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when the focus point mode is changed, usually in result of QCameraFocusControl::setFocusPointMode call or capture mode changes.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QCameraFocusZoneList QCameraFocusControl::focusZones() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the list of zones, the camera is using for focusing or focused on.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraFocusControl::focusZonesChanged()
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when the set of zones, camera focused on is changed.
Usually the zones list is changed when the camera is focused.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QCameraFocusControl::isFocusModeSupported(QCameraFocus::FocusModes mode) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if focus mode is supported.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QCameraFocusControl::isFocusPointModeSupported(QCameraFocus::FocusPointMode mode) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the camera focus point mode is supported.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QCameraFocusControl::setCustomFocusPoint(const QPointF &point)
db:section.db:para: Sets the custom focus point.
If camera supports fixed set of focus points, it should use the nearest supported focus point, and return the actual focus point with QCameraFocusControl::focusZones().

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QCameraFocusControl::setFocusMode(QCameraFocus::FocusModes mode)
db:section.db:para: Set the focus mode to mode.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QCameraFocusControl::setFocusPointMode(QCameraFocus::FocusPointMode mode)
db:section.db:para: Sets the camera focus point selection mode.

db:section.db:title: QCameraFocusControl_iid
db:section.db:para: Defines the interface name of the QCameraFocusControl class.
